text: Dongargaon is a village located in Indore District, Madhyapradesh, India. == Universities and colleges == * Dr. B.R. Ambedkar University of Social Sciences * Bherulal Patidar Government PG College Mhow == Schools == * Shri Sai Academy * Government School Dongargaon * Ashiyana Public School * Government School Naya Mhow ==References== Category:Villages in Indore district
title: Dongargaon
